commands.name: az providerhub provider-registration resource-action delete-resource
commands.syntax:
az providerhub provider-registration resource-action delete-resource [--ids]
                                                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                     [--provider-namespace]
                                                                     [--resource-action-name]
                                                                     [--resources]
                                                                     [--subscription]
